endpoints.name: Fetch candlestick data for instrument

pathParameters.name: Instrument ID
pathParameters.description: The unique ID of the account to retrieve.

queryParameters.name: Price
queryParameters.description: The Price component(s) to get candlestick data for. Can contain any combination of the characters “M” (midpoint candles) “B” (bid candles) and “A” (ask candles). [default=M]

queryParameters.name: granularity
queryParameters.description: The granularity of the candlesticks to fetch [default=S5]

queryParameters.name: count
queryParameters.description: The number of candlesticks to return in the reponse. Count should not be specified if both the start and end parameters are provided, as the time range combined with the graularity will determine the number of candlesticks to return. [default=500, maximum=5000]

queryParameters.name: from
queryParameters.description: The start of the time range to fetch candlesticks for.

queryParameters.name: to
queryParameters.description: The end of the time range to fetch candlesticks for.

queryParameters.name: smooth
queryParameters.description: A flag that controls whether the candlestick is “smoothed” or not. A smoothed candlestick uses the previous candle’s close price as its open price, while an unsmoothed candlestick uses the first price from its time range as its open price. [default=False]

queryParameters.name: includeFirst
queryParameters.description: A flag that controls whether the candlestick that is covered by the from time should be included in the results. This flag enables clients to use the timestamp of the last completed candlestick received to poll for future candlesticks but avoid receiving the previous candlestick repeatedly. [default=True]

queryParameters.name: dailyAlignment
queryParameters.description: The hour of the day (in the specified timezone) to use for granularities that have daily alignments. [default=17, minimum=0, maximum=23]

queryParameters.name: alignmentTimezone
queryParameters.description: The timezone to use for the dailyAlignment parameter. Candlesticks with daily alignment will be aligned to the dailyAlignment hour within the alignmentTimezone. Note that the returned times will still be represented in UTC. [default=America/New_York]

queryParameters.name: weeklyAlignment
queryParameters.description: The day of the week used for granularities that have weekly alignment. [default=Friday]

endpoints.name: Fetch an order book for an instrument

pathParameters.name: Instrument ID
pathParameters.description: The unique ID of the account to retrieve.

queryParameters.name: time
queryParameters.description: The time of the snapshot to fetch. If not specified, then the most recent snapshot is fetched.

endpoints.name: Fetch an position book for an instrument

pathParameters.name: Instrument ID
pathParameters.description: The unique ID of the account to retrieve.

queryParameters.name: time
queryParameters.description: The time of the snapshot to fetch. If not specified, then the most recent snapshot is fetched.

endpoints.name: Get a list of Orders in an Account

queryParameters.name: ids
queryParameters.description: List of Order IDs to retrieve

queryParameters.name: state
queryParameters.description: The state to filter the requested Orders by [default=PENDING]

queryParameters.name: instrument
queryParameters.description: The instrument to filter the requested orders by.

queryParameters.name: count
queryParameters.description: The maximum number of Orders to return [default=50, maximum=500]

queryParameters.name: beforeID
queryParameters.description: The maximum Order ID to return. If not provided the most recent Orders in the Account are returned

endpoints.name: Get all Pending Orders
Get all Pending Orders
Get a list of Trades for an Account

queryParameters.name: ids
queryParameters.description: List of Order IDs to retrieve

queryParameters.name: state
queryParameters.description: The state to filter the requested Orders by [default=PENDING]

queryParameters.name: instrument
queryParameters.description: The instrument to filter the requested orders by

queryParameters.name: count
queryParameters.description: The maximum number of Orders to return [default=50, maximum=500]

queryParameters.name: beforeID
queryParameters.description: The maximum Order ID to return. If not provided the most recent Orders in the Account are returned

endpoints.name: Get a list of open Trades for an Account
Get the details of a specific Trade in an Account
List all Position details for Account
Get the details of a single instrument's Position in an Account
Get pricing information for a specified list of instruments for an Account

queryParameters.name: instruments
queryParameters.description: List of Instruments to get pricing for.

queryParameters.name: since
queryParameters.description: Date/Time filter to apply to the response. Only prices and home conversions (if requested) with a time later than this filter (i.e. the price has changed after the since time) will be provided, and are filtered independently.

queryParameters.name: includeUnitsAvailable
queryParameters.description: Flag that enables the inclusion of the unitsAvailable field in the returned Price objects. [default=True]Deprecated: Will be removed in a future API update.

queryParameters.name: includeHomeConversions
queryParameters.description: Flag that enables the inclusion of the homeConversions field in the returned response. An entry will be returned for each currency in the set of all base and quote currencies present in the requested instruments list. [default=False]

endpoints.name: Get a list of Transactions

queryParameters.name: from
queryParameters.description: The starting time (inclusive) of the time range for the Transactions being queried. [default=Account Creation Time]

queryParameters.name: to
queryParameters.description: The ending time (inclusive) of the time range for the Transactions being queried. [default=Request Time]

queryParameters.name: type
queryParameters.description: A filter for restricting the types of Transactions to retreive.

endpoints.name: Get the details of a single Account Transaction
Get a range of Transactions for an Account based on Transaction IDs

queryParameters.name: from
queryParameters.description: The starting time (inclusive) of the time range for the Transactions being queried. [default=Account Creation Time]

queryParameters.name: to
queryParameters.description: The ending time (inclusive) of the time range for the Transactions being queried. [default=Request Time]

queryParameters.name: type
queryParameters.description: A filter for restricting the types of Transactions to retreive.

endpoints.name: Get a range of Transactions for an Account starting at a provided on Transaction ID

queryParameters.name: id
queryParameters.description: The ID of the last Transacion fetched. This query will return all Transactions newer than the TransactionID.
